title: Killing Abyssal Spider (Part 2)
body:
Killing Abyssal Spider (Part 2)

"So Miss Spider, give me a reason not to kill you and turn you into one of my minions as well," Evan asked the same question that the Abyssal Spider asked him earlier.

The Abyssal Spider was silent for a moment after hearing Evan. It looked at Kazil's Shadow Undead which was deeper in the cave. The Abyssal Spider had some confidence in fighting against a single S rank hunter, but it had no confidence in facing Evan and Kazil at the same time.

Moreover, the Abyssal Spider was a monster that was not proficient in fighting. It always relied on the large number of spiders in its army to fight against its enemies, but after seeing what happened earlier, the Abyssal Spider knew that the numbers were completely useless against Evan.

"I admit that I am not confident enough to face two S-rank hunters at the same time." The Abyssal Spider said after a moment of silence, "It is your win this time. Just take your friends and leave from here."
